page.title: 12DOMESDAY PROJECT RESEARCHER
page.content: { { } It is Monday, 24th June - Midsummer Day and we all go to explore Suckley and district. At 10 a.m. after walking a little way it starts to rain. We take a side turning, the rain increases, it's the wrong turning! It takes twenty minutes to get back on to the right road. We trudge along in the rain until we come to Byfields Farm. Now it is absolutely pouring. Darrel and Richard go to a house to ask some questions. A little further on we meet Mrs. Johnson and she tells us it is too wet to carry on, so we slowly make our way back to the cars. We leave at about 12.10 and get back to school at 12.30. Perhaps before the end of the term we shall get ONE FINE DAY to finish the Domesday Project!
